purpose: Illustrate common failure modes in cloud implementation
title: Many organizations are experiencing one or more failure modes as part of their cloud journey
reasoning_strategy: List common failure modes and their implications

tables.description: Illustrates failure modes and their implications

cells: Success in implementing a few greenfield applications on public-cloud platform
Determination to use public cloud to drive innovation and scalability in core-tech environment
Companies have moved significant portion of tech environment to public-cloud platform
Companies have left developers to their own devices in configuring cloud services.
Inability to make business case to extend use of cloud into heart of technology environment supporting primary businesses
Inability to build out automation or reference architectures required to use public-cloud platform services in a secure, resilient, and compliant fashion
Did so largely by replacing on-premises with off-premises virtual machines, resulting in few benefits in flexibility and, in many cases, increased operating costs
Replicating absence of standards from on-premises environment in the cloud and creating significant security, resiliency, and compliance risks
